sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../tailwind.output.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCheck, faTimes } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import Menu from './Menu' type Data = { id: number; name: string; phone: string; distance: string; image: any; vote: boolean } const Card: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const { status, data, error } = useQuery('restaurants', () => fetch('/api/restaurants').then((x) => x.json())) const [iconShown, setIconShown] = useState(false) const toggleIconVisibility = () => { setIconShown(!iconShown) } return (
{status}
{error &&
{error}
}
{status === 'loading' ? ( Loading... ) : status === 'error' ? ( Error: {error?.message} ) : (

Places

{data?.map((restaurant) => (

{restaurant.name}

{restaurant.phone}
{restaurant.distance}
))}
)}
) } export default Card
